item.description:
Ride in the Pembroke/Marshfield/Scituate area....

 

36 miles in length....

 

Here's the route.....

﻿﻿http://www.mapmyride.com/routes/view/7537406

 on the link above...click on "notes" to get a turn by turn map....

 

Please bring a sense of adventure as I have not ridden this route before and will be following the cue sheet like you....

I recommend a bike in good working order that has been tuned up recently (I wouldn't recommend a mountain bike).  Bring energy food, water bottles, a helmet is required, a spare tire that fits your bike, sunscreen (pray for sun)....and a sense of humor!

See you there!

Rob

617-894-8454
item.how_to_find_us: My cell on the day of the ride is 617-894-8454
item.name: South Shore Ride
